name: The Friendship Weenie
description:
Deven Peters & Kaosi Ude

Baker University

First time ever making a game, didn't open up the engine til i got here lol.

It was written on Godot, very fun time.

It fits the theme because you leave your dog behind to get food for him because he is starving to death. All in the power of friendship.

Original music.

Arrow keys are controls.
